definition: point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items

sentences.english: Despite their many differences, there is a remarkable degree of homogeneity among them.
sentences.chinese: 他们的差异点虽多，但其间亦有极大的同质点。

sentences.english: Now, that is only for a point mass.
sentences.chinese: 那只是对于一个质点而言的。

sentences.english: What is the work done on the particle in this case?
sentences.chinese: 这种情况下对质点所作的功是多少？

sentences.english: And for non-breaking wave the horizontal particle velocity can be estimated by using regular wave theory.
sentences.chinese: 对于非破波，质点的水平速度可以由规则波理论得到。

sentences.english: Polarization of shear-wave is analysed by using particle motion diagram.
sentences.chinese: 用质点运动图的方法对横波的偏振进行了分析。

sentences.english: The transverse impact of variable cross-section flexible beam has been investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了质点对变截面柔性梁横向碰撞问题。

sentences.english: Taking the three dimensional bar element as an example, the formulations of the FPM are derived in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 以空间杆单元为例推导了有限质点法计算公式。

sentences.english: The shaking table test of an SMA strands-composite bearing;
sentences.chinese: 对两质点以滚球隔震模型进行了振动台试验。

sentences.english: This artical approaches the dynamics of relative motion of a system with variable mass.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究变质量质点系的相对运动动力学。

sentences.english: Therefore, if , the system of particles must be in equilibrium.
sentences.chinese: 故时质点系必处于平衡。

sentences.english: The molecules comprising this particle are continuously changing.
sentences.chinese: 组成该质点的分子是连续变化的。

sentences.english: A type of surface wave in which particles oscillate horizontally and perpendicularly to the direction of wave propagation.
sentences.chinese: 一种面波，质点水平地振动，并垂直于波传播的方向。

sentences.english: The transient response of a double-degree-of-freedom system under forced load is computed.
sentences.chinese: 最后计算了一个双质点系在强迫力下的瞬态响应。

sentences.english: Dynamic calculation model was series-wound more particle.
sentences.chinese: 动力计算模型采用的是弯剪型串联多质点系。

sentences.english: Thus we reduce considerably memory requirements and calculating time. Test runs showe…
sentences.chinese: 计算检验表明，与质点网格法相比，减少了数值波动。

sentences.english: A crossplot of two components of particle motion over a time window.
sentences.chinese: 质点在一个时窗内运动的两个分量的交会图。

definition: simple harmonic motion (in mechanics)/motion of a simple pendulum
simple harmonic (motion, oscillation etc in mechanics)
